messages.pages.about.meta.title: About
messages.pages.about.first_chapter: This website allows you to create your own Perfect Garage with 3 sports cars, and share it through social networks.
messages.pages.about.second_chapter: Why only 3 cars? Because as in real life, we have to make a choice. However you can create several garages: once saved, they'll be available in the menu.
messages.pages.about.third_chapter: As a sports cars fan, I created this website for free. There will be no ad or other commercial links. If you like this website, don't forget to share it!
messages.pages.about.fourth_chapter: At last, for any suggestion, you can contact me by mail:
messages.components.title.title: Perfect Garage

messages.components.layout.saved_button_tooltip_k: Save your garage, you'll find it in the menu
messages.components.layout.second_footer: . No cookie and no personal data are used by this website.
